SELECT LIKE_NO, DOG_NO, MEMBER_NO, DOG_NAME,
NVL( CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, DOG_BIRTHDAY) <= 12 THEN ROUND(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, DOG_BIRTHDAY)) || '개월' ELSE ROUND(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, DOG_BIRTHDAY) / 12) || '세' END, '알 수 없음' ) DOG_BIRTHDAY,
DOG_GENDER FROM DOG_LIKE LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DOG USING(DOG_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DOG_ADOPT_FL = 'N'
